pr_title: Mark a few Digital twin classes as final, fix javadocs not being detected

timeline.message:
Mark a few Digital twin classes as final, fix javadocs not being detected

These classes shouldn't be extended, so they should be marked as final

timeline.author: bikamani

replies.bodyText: Good idea. But this is Java, so I'll do javadocs ;)
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
